verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> all these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying ס

אָֽנֹכִ֖י֙ <S%H595><s%> I יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who הוֹצֵאתִ֛יךָ <S%H3318><s%> which have brought מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מִבֵּ֣֥ית <S%H1004><s%> out of the house עֲבָדִֽ֑ים׃ <S%H5650><s%> of bondage

לֹֽ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יִהְיֶֽה־ <S%H1961><s%> shall have לְךָ֛֩ אֱלֹהִ֥֨ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֖֜ים <S%H312><s%> Thou shalt have no other עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> before פָּנָֽ֗יַ <S%H6440><s%> before me

לֹֽ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַֽעֲשֶׂ֨ה־ <S%H6213><s%> Thou shalt not make לְךָ֥֣ פֶ֣֙סֶל֙ ׀ <S%H6459><s%> unto thee any graven image וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any תְּמוּנָ֡֔ה <S%H8544><s%> or any likeness אֲשֶׁ֤֣ר <S%H834><s%> [of any thing] that בַּשָּׁמַ֣֙יִם֙ ׀ <S%H8064><s%> [is] in heaven מִמַּ֡֔עַל <S%H4605><s%> above וַֽאֲשֶׁ֥ר֩ <S%H834><s%> of what בָּאָ֖֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> or that [is] in the earth מִתַָּ֑֜חַת <S%H8478><s%> beneath וַאֲשֶׁ֥֣ר <S%H834><s%> of what בַּמַּ֖֣יִם ׀ <S%H4325><s%> beneath or that [is] in the water מִתַּ֥֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under לָאָֽ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> under the earth

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִשְׁתַּחְוֶ֥֣ה <S%H7812><s%> Thou shalt not bow down לָהֶ֖ם֮ וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or תָעָבְדֵ֑ם֒ <S%H5647><s%> thyself to them nor serve כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָֽנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> I יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> them for I the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> God קַנָּ֔א <S%H7067><s%> [am] a jealous פֹּ֠קֵד <S%H6485><s%> visiting עֲוֹ֨ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity אָבֹ֧ת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בָּנִ֛ים <S%H1121><s%> upon the children עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שִׁלֵּשִׁ֥ים <S%H8029><s%> unto the third וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רִבֵּעִ֖ים <S%H7256><s%> and fourth לְשֹׂנְאָֽ֑י׃ <S%H8130><s%> [generation] of them that hate

וְעֹ֥֤שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> And shewing חֶ֖֙סֶד֙ <S%H2617><s%> mercy לַאֲלָפִ֑֔ים <S%H505><s%> unto thousands לְאֹהֲבַ֖י <S%H157><s%> of them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> me and keep מִצְוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H4687><s%> my commandments ס

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִשָּׂ֛א <S%H5375><s%> Thou shalt not take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לַשָּׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> in vain כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> will not יְנַקֶּה֙ <S%H5352><s%> will not hold him guiltless יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> that taketh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name לַשָּֽׁוְא׃ <S%H7723><s%> in vain פ
זָכ֛וֹר֩ <S%H2142><s%> Remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> י֥֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֖֜ת <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath לְקַדְּשֽׁ֗וֹ <S%H6942><s%> to keep it holy
שֵׁ֤֣שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> Six יָמִ֣ים֙ <S%H3117><s%> days תַּֽעֲבֹ֔ד֮ <S%H5647><s%> shalt thou labour וְעָשִׂ֖֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and do כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלַאכְתֶּֽךָ֒ <S%H4399><s%> all thy work

וְי֙וֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔֜י <S%H7637><s%> But the seventh שַׁבָּ֖֣ת ׀ <S%H7676><s%> [is] the sabbath לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לֹֽ֣א־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשֶׂ֣֨ה <S%H6213><s%> [in it] thou shalt not do כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מְלָאכָ֡֜ה <S%H4399><s%> any work אַתָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H859><s%> you וּבִנְךָֽ֣־ <S%H1121><s%> thou nor thy son וּ֠בִתֶּ֗ךָ <S%H1323><s%> nor thy daughter עַבְדְּךָ֤֨ <S%H5650><s%> thy manservant וַאֲמָֽתְךָ֜֙ <S%H519><s%> nor thy maidservant וּבְהֶמְתֶּ֔֗ךָ <S%H929><s%> nor thy cattle וְגֵרְךָ֖֙ <S%H1616><s%> nor thy stranger אֲשֶׁ֥֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּשְׁעָרֶֽ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> that [is] within thy gates

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> in שֵֽׁשֶׁת־ <S%H8337><s%> For [in] six יָמִים֩ <S%H3117><s%> days עָשָׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> made יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> heaven וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and earth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> the sea וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בָּ֔ם וַיָּ֖נַח <S%H5117><s%> and all that in them [is] and rested בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֑י <S%H7637><s%> the seventh עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that בֵּרַ֧ךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> wherefore the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֖ת <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath וַֽיְקַדְּשֵֽׁהוּ׃ <S%H6942><s%> and hallowed ס

כַּבֵּ֥ד <S%H3513><s%> Honour אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H517><s%> and thy mother לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> because of יַאֲרִכ֣וּן <S%H748><s%> may be long יָמֶ֔יךָ <S%H3117><s%> that thy days עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> in הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> upon the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָֽךְ׃ ס
לֹ֥֖א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִּֿרְצָֽ֖ח׃ <S%H7523><s%> Thou shalt not kill ס
לֹ֣֖א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִּֿנְאָֽ֑ף׃ <S%H5003><s%> Thou shalt not commit adultery ס
לֹ֣֖א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִּֿגְנֹֽ֔ב׃ <S%H1589><s%> Thou shalt not steal ס
לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲנֶ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> Thou shalt not bear בְרֵעֲךָ֖ <S%H7453><s%> against thy neighbour עֵ֥ד <S%H5707><s%> witness שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> false. ס

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַחְמֹ֖ד <S%H2530><s%> Thou shalt not covet בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house רֵעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7453><s%> thy neighbour's לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַחְמֹ֞ד <S%H2530><s%> thou shalt not covet אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife רֵעֶ֗ךָ <S%H7453><s%> thy neighbour's וְעַבְדּ֤וֹ <S%H5650><s%> nor his manservant וַאֲמָתוֹ֙ <S%H519><s%> nor his maidservant וְשׁוֹר֣וֹ <S%H7794><s%> nor his ox וַחֲמֹר֔וֹ <S%H2543><s%> nor his ass וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> anything אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that לְרֵעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7453><s%> nor any thing that [is] thy neighbour's פ

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הָעָם֩ <S%H5971><s%> And all the people רֹאִ֨ים <S%H7200><s%> saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקּוֹלֹ֜ת <S%H6963><s%> the thunderings וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלַּפִּידִ֗ם <S%H3940><s%> and the lightnings וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the noise הַשֹּׁפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> and the mountain עָשֵׁ֑ן <S%H6226><s%> smoking וַיַּ֤רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and when the people וַיָּנֻ֔עוּ <S%H5128><s%> [it] they removed וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> and stood מֵֽרָחֹֽק׃ <S%H7350><s%> afar off

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses דַּבֵּר־ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> yourself עִמָּ֖נוּ <S%H5973><s%> and we וְנִשְׁמָ֑עָה <S%H8085><s%> thou with us and we will hear וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> speak עִמָּ֛נוּ <S%H5973><s%> not אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> but let not God פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or נָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> with us lest we die

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָם֮ <S%H5971><s%> unto the people אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָאוּ֒ <S%H3372><s%> Fear כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> in לְבַֽעֲבוּר֙ <S%H5668><s%> to נַסּ֣וֹת <S%H5254><s%> prove אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> is come הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> not for God וּבַעֲב֗וּר <S%H5668><s%> order תִּהְיֶ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> become יִרְאָת֛וֹ <S%H3374><s%> you and that his fear עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> may be before פְּנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> may be before your faces לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> you may not תֶחֱטָֽאוּ׃ <S%H2398><s%> that ye sin

וַיַּעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> stood הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people מֵרָחֹ֑ק <S%H7350><s%> afar off וּמֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> and Moses נִגַּ֣שׁ <S%H5066><s%> drew near אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָֽעֲרָפֶ֔ל <S%H6205><s%> unto the thick darkness אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> where God פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹאמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus thou shalt say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you רְאִיתֶ֔ם <S%H7200><s%> Ye have seen כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> with you from heaven דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> that I have talked עִמָּכֶֽם׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשׂ֖וּן <S%H6213><s%> Ye shall not make אִתִּ֑י <S%H854><s%> besides אֱלֹ֤הֵי <S%H430><s%> with me gods כֶ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> of silver וֵאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> unto you gods זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> neither shall ye make לָכֶֽם׃

מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> An altar אֲדָמָה֮ <S%H127><s%> of earth תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> thou shalt make לִּי֒ וְזָבַחְתָּ֣ <S%H2076><s%> unto me and shalt sacrifice עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹלֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5930><s%> thereon thy burnt offerings וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלָמֶ֔יךָ <S%H8002><s%> and thy peace offerings אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹֽאנְךָ֖ <S%H6629><s%> thy sheep וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּקָרֶ֑ךָ <S%H1241><s%> and thine oxen בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> in all places אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> where אַזְכִּ֣יר <S%H2142><s%> where I record אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמִ֔י <S%H8034><s%> my name אָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> I will come אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you וּבֵרַכְתִּֽיךָ׃ <S%H1288><s%> unto thee and I will bless

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If מִזְבַּ֤ח <S%H4196><s%> me an altar אֲבָנִים֙ <S%H68><s%> of stone תַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> And if thou wilt make לִּ֔י לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִבְנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> thou shalt not build אֶתְהֶ֖ן <S%H853><s%> גָּזִ֑ית <S%H1496><s%> it of hewn stone כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for חַרְבְּךָ֛ <S%H2719><s%> thy tool הֵנַ֥פְתָּ <S%H5130><s%> for if thou lift up עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> on וַתְּחַֽלְלֶֽהָ׃ <S%H2490><s%> upon it thou hast polluted

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> Neither shalt thou go up בְמַעֲלֹ֖ת <S%H4609><s%> by steps עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto מִזְבְּחִ֑י <S%H4196><s%> unto mine altar אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> so לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִגָּלֶ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> be not discovered עֶרְוָתְךָ֖ <S%H6172><s%> that thy nakedness עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and פ
